transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Haan ji, Mohsin ji se baat ho raha hai na?

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Sir good morning, Vaibhav bol raha hu main IndiaMART account manager.

Customer: Haan ji boliye.

Executive: Sir kal parso aapka ek miss call pada hua hai mere number pe. Aise chutti thi maine dekha nahi tha. To koi issue face hua hai sir service mein?

Customer: Haan wo nahi puch raha tha ki service chhodna isme kuch aa nahi raha hai requirement. Itna kuch dekh rahe hain jo ladka koi use kar raha hai mere wo bata raha hai ki only valuation ka aur kuch aise aa raha hai properly hai na jo apan ko function ka simple hai.

Executive: Jo aapke chhote bhai hai na jo kya naam hai uska Rashid ji Rashid ji ki baat kar raha hu.

Customer: Haan haan jo wo ke aa nahi raha hai usme to ek baar aap baat karke dekhiye kuch ho.

Executive: Okay okay. To mujhe unse baat karni hai matlab iske regarding?

Customer: Nahi mere ko bola hai to jis tarah aapko thoda bata du.

Executive: Sir actually dekhiye dikkat ye hai na Mohsin ji main batau problem ye hai ki leads jo aapke portal pe hai wo aapke product line mein itna competition hai ki by lead 15-20 second tak maximum portal pe rahegi sir okay. Matlab lead wo utha rahe hain but convert convert sir IndiaMART ek matchmaking portal hai yaha pe buyer aayega seller ko convert to khud se karna padega na sir IndiaMART to convert karke degi nahi sir ye aapko bhi pata hai right buyer ko aapko convince karna padega by lead jo achi lead hoti hai wo wo 15-20 second mein Mohsin ji sold out ho jati hai sir 15-20 second maximum. To bahut jyada active hone ki jarurat hai ek log ke use karne se kaam nahi chalega teen char log ko bar bar IndiaMART open karna padega din bhar mein 20-20 bar at least tab jaake sir wo badhiya lead milegi aur fir convert karna aapki zimmedari hogi sir.

Customer: Jaise wo agar koi ke dekh bhi rahe hain na to wo jaise bahut hi jaise aap agar record mein dekh sakte hain ki temple ki lead utha hi nahi pa rahe aa hi nahi show nahi ho rahi.

Executive: Temple kya bol rahe hain?

Customer: Haan temple aur fountain ki.

Executive: To ab jaise ki agar main temple ki baat karu to stone temple to stone temple mein 23 lead aapne uthai hai khair isme aapne ye matlab abhi ye kafi do hafte se aapne isme nahi uthaya hai sahi keh rahe hain aap abhi ye B rank ka pada hai ek second fountain.

Executive: Ek kaam karte hain sir isme abhi kitne log IndiaMART use kar rahe hain sir?

Customer: Abhi do do kar rahe hain main teesre ko bhi chalo main kar dunga wo koi baat nahi hai bas wahi hoti hai ki timing ki ab kis time pe kaun sa hai fir bhi kisi na kisi ko to wo notification aayega to idea ho gayi ke.

Executive: Notification to aapke product line mein sir kyun matlab aap wohi jaiye kyunki notification ka wait karenge to bahut dikkat ho jayegi. Dekhiye stone temple ki leads aayi hui thi sir chhut gayi hai dekhiye teen ghante pehle Nasik se aayi thi teen ghante pehle ye sold out ho gayi Ahmedabad se 12 ghante pehle aayi thi marble carved marble carved temple ye bhi sold out ho gayi.

Customer: Jaise aaj to main khud hi hai na jaise abhi man lijiye koi hospital mein hu main subah 6 baje se main khud chala raha hu to mere ko bhi ye na kuch show nahi ho rahi.

Executive: Sir pata hai aapse baat karte karte mere portal pe teen lead sold out ho gayi theek hai lead na aapko ye samajhna padega sir ki bahut jaldi portal pe bik ja rahi hai okay aap inquiry calls bhi thoda dekha kariye ki inquiry lead manager mein kya kya aa rahi hai jahan pe buyer samne se aapki company ko inquiry bhej raha hai requirement bhej raha hai wo bhi inquiry wo view view catalog mein dekh rahe hain catalog view wala nahi sir lead manager direct inquiry aati hai jaise aapko na kai sari direct inquiry bhi aati hai jaise ki matlab on an average aapko month mein 20 se 30 inquiry aati hi aati hai aur abhi bhi nau inquiry aapko 17 din mein aa chuki hai sir dekho main dikkat pata hai kya Mohsin ji main bata du main problem yahi hai ki bahut competition hai okay kyunki jo product ki aap requirement mang rahe hain usme already wo sab categories yaha added hai aur ache se added hai usme category mein to koi dikkat hai hi nahi main dikkat ye hai sir ki matlab ek do teen log use kare aur lead sabse pehle uthane ka try kare sir aur matlab tabhi milegi sir milne ke baad fir niche karne ki zimmedari sir aap company pe hi aati hai hai na ab agar aapko lagta hai sir catalog mein kuch update karna hai to aap mujhe kuch photos vagaira bhej sakte hain white marble ki aur waterfall mein to chaliye theek hai.

Customer: Main maine ye requirement mein dekhiye wo lead ka.

Executive: Hmm. Ek kaam karte hain sir isme agar aap bolo ki lead fountains kam aa rahi hai to fountain ke products mein thode se product kam pade hue hain aap mujhe fountain ke kuch wo bhej dijiye kya kehte hain images bhej dijiye okay aur temple ke bhi agar aapko ye do product mein jyada business karna hai IndiaMART pe to aap in do product ke jitni photos vagaira padi hui hai please mujhe whatsapp kar dijiye to main aapko whatsapp pe hi kar de raha hu iske andar mere paas jaise kafi sare to catalog mein add kiye hue hain.

Customer: Ji ji ji pade to hai sir lekin dikkat kya hai aapke product line mein na aap log jo photos bhejte hain aapke yaha se do teen logo ne mere se baat ki hai ha dikkat ye aati hai sir ki photos ki quality sahi nahi rehti hai ye main kai baar bol chuka hu photos ki quality hi bekar rehti hai sir matlab ki uska density nahi rehta hai pixel resolution ki wo buyer ko hum dikha sake photo wahi reject ho ja rahi hai to thoda sa sir matlab matlab jitna ho sake to maine add kiya hai alag alag logo ne photo bheja hai wo sab maine add kiya hai but fir bhi sir aap ek bar aap ek koi updated catalog mujhe bhej dete na sirf temple aur fountain ki bas ye do product ki aapke paas jo bhi nayi photo hai sir please mujhe bhej dijiye.

Executive: Theek hai mere paas jo bhi rahega main aapko send kar deta hu main aapko whatsapp pe hi kar dunga Mohsin ji theek hai.

Customer: Theek hai sir okay.

Executive: Okay sir okay thank you.

Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving expected leads.

- Difficulty in converting leads into sales.

- Temple and fountain leads not showing properly.



Resolution:

- Explained competition affects lead visibility.

- Advised to have multiple people use IndiaMART.

- Suggested updating catalog with high-quality photos.

- Asked to send fountain and temple images on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send updated photos on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, product visibility, competition
